page.title: 18ST.JOHN'S SCHOOL,CALDER VALE
page.content: We go each year on a weekend visit to an interesting place, usually staying at a Youth Hostel, and meet frequently with other small schools in this area. There is a School Association which organises various social and fund-raising activities, whilst each Wednesday afternoon we hold a Mother and Toddler Club for our pre-school children. This has now been running for over two years. Other activities in which we are involved are: Chess Club, Church celebrations and festivals, and visiting theatre groups. There are two full-time teachers at the school plus a part-time teacher who comes in on two mornings each week. We have a playground and a playing field from which we can see all the way to the coast at Blackpool.
